## üê∂ My pet-projects

### [Zmanim bot for Telegram](https://github.com/benyaming/zmanim_bot)  
The bot provides all features of Jewish calendar (like zmanim, date
conversions and holidays dates) by user location.

### [Zmanim API](https://github.com/benyaming/zmanim_api)  
Simple high-level api for all features of hebrew calendar.

### [Israel bus info bot for Telegram](https://github.com/benyaming/israel_bus_info_bot)  
The bot provides real time information and updates on buses
locations and schedules, based on the user location.
